title: Just Don't Touch It - Featuring Shameless Maya
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
On this week's episode of #TheFriendZone, we're joined by our unofficial fourth host, Shameless Maya!! We discuss why she's now decided to wait until marriage to have sex again, how honoring that vow has been challenging in her new relationship and we share funny stories on trying to date while celibate/abstaining.

THE FRIEND ZONE LIVE IN NEW YORK. 4TH ANNIVERSARY SHOW ON SATURDAY, AUGUST 10TH - Tickets available now www.thefriendzonelive.com

Black Business of the Week: Kia Patterson, franchise owner of Grocery Outlet in Compton, CA

Thank you to our Sponsors:

Frank & Oak -  Discover what your wardrobe has been missing. Go to https://www.frankandoak.com/FRIENDZONE to get $25 off your first subscription box and try style plan by Frank & Oak completely free.

Each box has free delivery and contains over $40 worth of toys and treats, with subscriptions starting at just $22. For a FREE EXTRA MONTH of BarkBox, visit https://www.barkbox.com/FRIENDZONE 

GOAT - The largest marketplace in the world for authentic Yeezys, Jordans and over 600k sneaker listings. Go to https://www.goat.com/FRIENDZONE to find your perfect pair and support our show!

Have a GREAT day!
